title: No skill champions...
body: Everytime I jump in a game there is always someone complaining about the enemy team or our team having tryndamere,master yi etc.I mean dont they understand that most of the champs are pretty balanced but they still complains about how they are unkillable and broken but the only thing I dont like about the "non skill champ" is the one that execute you especially when you are trying to outplay them. Btw what is the champ you hate the most to be lane against me its garen :)

replies.body:
there are no skill champions, they are so mechanically simple that all you have to do is mash your keyboard and they will be effective.

however there is a thing called **decision making** which heavily ties into how effective you can be.

even simple champs rushing in 1v5 when they're 0-5, 3 levels down still lose.
I guess you are right but sometime its a mirror match up and the one with the most experienced on that champ win will that be call skill or decision making ? Just curious about it.
They don't have another excuse, and they known that you can't prove a champion needs skill because its your opinion.
The only complains about Yi i hear is that from his team how this champion is useless.
In lane again? idk. In game against, as an adc main who like to play jinx/ashe  more than others.... I tend to ban Zed out a lot.... or hec.
